dialogue: I hired an elbonian consultant because we couldn't afford anyone local.
Have you ever consulted in this country?
No, but people are people, so I assume it isn't that different from Elbonia.
Tell us what we should do about the problems in our distribution system.
I recommend executing one of your distributors as a warning to the others.
I'm going to need a second opinion.
My second opinion is that your barber must hate your guts.
